metadata.title: CVE-2013-4491 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability inactionpack/lib/action_view/helpers/translation_helper.rb in theinternationalization component in Ruby on Rails 3.x before 3.2.16 and 4.xbefore 4.0.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia a crafted string that triggers generation of a fallback string by thei18n gem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4491` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-actionpack-3.2 - 3.2.16-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.16-3').
